description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Reporting to: General Director
              
              •	Develop financial models and conduct financial feasibility of acquisitions, sale of land, construct to sell and long –term build-to-suit projects
              
              •	Identify viable development and acquisition projects in the identified sub markets for expansion of Viet Nam operations
              
              •	Design suitable corporate and financial structures for proposed developments and acquisitions
              
              •	Actively assist in negotiations and closure of identified developments and acquisitions/sale upon approval of management
              
              •	Prepare presentations and approval papers of proposed developments and acquisitions/sale for all internal management approvals including Board papers
              
              •	Develop professional relationships with local state statutory bodies and developers in targeted markets to identify potential development and acquisition opportunities
              
              •	Participate and network actively in Conferences and Events related to the Real Estate Sector
              
              •	Provide monthly or quarterly updates and forecasts, whenever required, of Vietnam’s economic, legal and business environments, and sub-markets in real estate
              
              •	Coordinate cross-department country reviews and strategic planning exercises for Viet Nam operations.
              
              •	Actively market and source leads for sale/BTS/CTS projects.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Estate Management, Business Administration, or its equivalent.
              
              - Good command both of English and Vietnamese writing and speaking skills.
              
              - Strong in all phases of real estate business/ project investment and divestment.
              
              - Excellent interpersonal, leadership, communication and negotiation skills.
              
              - High drive, motivation and results-orientation.
              
              - Ability to multi-task and deliver under tight deadlines
              
              - Minimum 5 years working experience for related strategic real-estate sector.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
